abstract: In connection with the course of programming and designing based on web service, there is many kind of knowledge is concerned, and there is more applications in many area. Meanwhile, students study hard in the course because teaching is not effective. So we should reform the teaching through the theory of CDIO. The article states how to use the theory of CDIO to reform the teaching of the course trough the method of conceiving, designing, implementing and operating in every module.
